Text: thanks.when r u gonna upload other 2 matches?

Mate! You have made a Cornishman living in Thailand very very happy and I thank you from the bottom of my heart for the uploads, I am in heaven, a match a day to watch what more could I ask for, please keep it up you are my lifeline.

I just registered as a member here so I could thank you for uploading these games.  I have watched every one, and it has been a joy.  Living where I do there is no TV showing the games, so this is a real lifeline.  Thanks again.
